Why Artists Choose ACE

Because your creative business deserves more than generic accounting

My Story

From Artist to Artist Advocate

I started as a painter in Connecticut, juggling commissions, gallery shows, and teaching gigs. Like you, I struggled with the business side — until I realized that understanding my finances was the key to artistic freedom.

After mastering bookkeeping and transforming my own creative practice, I discovered my true calling: helping fellow artists build sustainable careers without sacrificing their creative vision.

Today, I specialize in the unique financial needs of artists — from tracking project-based income to maximizing creative deductions. Because I've been where you are, I know exactly what you need.
